DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate clincal practice regard prevention arterial venous thrombosis follow ovarian stimulation . Secondary outcome : 1 ) describe incidence risk factor arterial venous thrombosis woman undergo assisted reproductive technology 2 ) identify incidence risk factor ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome woman
DOC.detailed_description: All woman undergo assisted reproductive tecnology order receive vitro fertilization French center include study . These woman follow 12 month ovarian stimulation get pregnant 3 month stimulation lead pregnancy . Risk factor thrombosis ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome collect woman . At visit , woman ask whether arterial and/or venous thrombosis occur .
DOC.criteria: All woman undergo ovarian stimulation order receive vitro fertilization Age < 18 year Women refuse particpate study No health coverage Women guardianship Women receive therapeutic dos anticoagulation
